title: Client Patched during a game
body: So, I had a game just then, in which I DCed twice, and on the last one, after I DCed I exited LoL then opened it again and the client was updating. Lost the game because of that and got a Leaver Buster. Rito pls.

replies.body:
Hey l Rev l,

It's likely that some of your game files were corrupted, so the client had to fix those issues. If you have any further issues or questions, don't hesitate to ping me!
